::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04a 10.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I've already taken some measures to address this. It will take some time to rebuild everything, but no matter if it's culture, friendship, or trust... we will rebuild it.
:;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} About what happened after I fell asleep that day...
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 1.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' You mean, what happened after The Doctor put you to sleep?
::{{DIcon}} Did he take the Gnoses?<ref group="Translation Note" name="number of gnoses">In the original Chinese text, it is left ambiguous whether this line is talking about the Dendro Gnosis, the Electro Gnosis, or both Gnoses.</ref>
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 2.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' You guessed correctly... The top-ranked Fatui Harbingers, up to No. 3, possess power comparable to that of gods. I was no match for him in that kind of situation.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 3.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' However, in spite of the bad situation, I still managed to make a fair deal with The Doctor.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 4.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I'm sure you remember the entity that changed your fate &mdash; the [[Heavenly Principles]].
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 5.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' In fact, the Heavenly Principles has been quiet since the Khaenri'ah disaster five hundred years ago. I used this point as leverage against The Doctor.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 6.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I told him that the Heavenly Principles may be awakened if I destroyed a Gnosis. Although it was just a bluff, he still fell for it.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 7.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I assumed that the Heavenly Principles wouldn't just stand by and let such extensive damage to its "laws" take place.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 8.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' And as for what I exchanged for the Gnoses...<ref group="Translation Note" name="number of gnoses" />
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 9.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' The exchange served as both punishment for The Doctor, as well as a boon of new knowledge that I couldn't refuse as the God of Wisdom.
<!--::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04b 10.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I'm sure you probably want to ask what that knowledge was... Please forgive me, for I can't tell you that right now, but I believe you'll discover it one day.--><!--This line does not play-->
:;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} About The Balladeer...
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04c 1.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' He's still in a coma. I've hidden him like how one would hide a feather.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04c 2.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I know you have many misgivings about him, but as someone who had "become a god," he has retained a number of very useful features.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04c 3.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Don't worry, I'll keep an eye on him and make sure he doesn't do any evil.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04c 4.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' In addition, there are still some mysteries left in him. Some things may be very clear from my perspective, but he has still yet to understand them himself.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04c 5.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' His future will be determined by fate.
:;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} About Fontaine, the next stop on my journey...
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04d 1.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Is that where you're headed next? Fontaine, the nation of justice.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04d 2.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' As far as I know, that nation operates on a judicial system.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03d 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Does their archon personally judge people?
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04d 3.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' No, there's a [[Neuvillette|Chief Justice]] in Fontaine. Generally speaking, the Hydro Archon, [[Focalors]], won't preside over individual trials.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04d 4.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' However... even then, Focalors will still make herself present at just about every trial. It seems that she just likes to immerse herself in that sort of atmosphere.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04d 5.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' As archon, she still reserves the right to influence the final verdict.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04d 6.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Anyway, let's just say she's got... hmm... a very unique personality.
:;(Return to option selection)
:{{DIcon}} I've got nothing else to say.
:;(Continue to next section)
----
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 1.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Are you sure? Isn't there something else that you haven't asked about yet?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? You mean...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 2a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 2b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' About... your {{MC|m=sister|f=brother}}.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 3a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 3b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' While you were resting at Gandharva Ville, I took some time to perform an Irminsul search for information on your {{MC|m=sister|f=brother}}.
:{{DIcon}} But... we both came from beyond the sea of stars.
:{{DIcon}} There shouldn't be any information on {{MC|m=her|f=him}} in Irminsul.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 2a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 2b.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah, isn't Irminsul a repository for all the information and memories of Teyvat? So there shouldn't be anything on {{MC|m=him|f=her}} or {{MC|m=his sister|f=her brother}}.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 4.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' This is true in your case, {{Traveler}}. Irminsul indeed does not have any information on you.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 5.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' However...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 6a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 6b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' There must be something different about your {{MC|m=sister|f=brother}}... because as it turns out, the world has recorded information on {{MC|m=her|f=him}} after all.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 3.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What!?
:{{DIcon}} !?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 7a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 7b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' There's only one possible explanation: {{MC|m=She|f=He}} belongs to this world.
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (How is that possible? We journeyed the sea of stars all our lives until we came here. How could {{MC|m=she|f=he}} possibly hail from Teyvat...?)
:'''{{Traveler}}:''' (Things don't add up. Is there something wrong with my memories? Or is it this world that has done something to {{MC|m=her|f=him}}...)
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 4.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' But... nothing about this makes any sense. Wasn't this your first trip to Teyvat?
:{{DIcon}} Do you have any further intel?
:{{DIcon}} Do you know what {{MC|m=she|f=he}} has been through?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 8.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' According to the records I was able to access, your sibling suddenly appeared in Khaenri'ah...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 9a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 9b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' After the Khaenri'ah disaster, {{MC|m=she|f=he}} began {{MC|m=her|f=his}} journey through the seven nations of Teyvat.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 10a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 10b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' But just as {{MC|m=her|f=his}} journey was about to reach its conclusion, the Irminsul records on {{MC|m=her|f=him}} suddenly become fuzzy...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 5a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 5b.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' What do you mean, "fuzzy"? Did something happen to {{MC|m=her|f=him}}?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 12a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 12b.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' All I know for sure is that somebody, for reasons only they can know, is deliberately obfuscating {{MC|m=her|f=his}} fate...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 13.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' And whoever it is... if they can do that, who knows what else they're capable of.
:{{DIcon}} Could it be related to... the Abyss?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 6a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 6b.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' But even that wouldn't explain how {{MC|m=she|f=he}} somehow comes from this world...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 14.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Something else I noticed was that according to these records, the Fatui have not classified your sibling as one of the "[[Descender]]s."
:{{DIcon}} Descenders?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 7.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' ...What's a Descender? Paimon's never heard of it...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 15.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' Look, I'm sure you must be curious about the information I received from the Fatui in return for my Gnosis, right?<ref group="Translation Note" name="number of gnoses" />
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 16.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' A very important part of the intel was about this world's Descenders... external beings, ones that don't belong to this world.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 17.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' {{Traveler}}, you are Teyvat's "Fourth Descender."
:{{DIcon}} Fourth...?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 8a.ogg}} {{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 8b.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh!? So the Fatui count three other Descenders before {{Traveler}}? And {{MC|m=his sister|f=her brother}} isn't even one of them?
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 18.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' That's right. My current hypothesis is that the "First Descender" was likely what we now call the Heavenly Principles.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 19.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' As for the other Descenders... I still need to verify their existence. It could take me some time.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 9.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Whew... Paimon's head's about to burst from all this crazy new information...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 20.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' And yet, even knowing all this, I'm sure you must still have a lot of unanswered questions. I must say, I truly regret that I can't help you more as the God of Wisdom...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 21.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' There are many questions in my heart as well. I will need some time to go through each one of them.
:{{DIcon}} Same here... I'll need some time to reflect on what you've said.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 22.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' And soon, you'll also begin your journey anew, and depart from Sumeru.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 23.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' I'm very interested in your future. It's a journey that can't be observed or recorded by this world...
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 24.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' If fate is the ultimate knowledge, then your future will be the ultimate fate.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon's sure glad we got to meet you, Nahida.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 25.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' The pleasure is all mine... I can't thank you enough.
:{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 26.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' All right, that's enough talk for today. If you ever miss me, just close your eyes &mdash; and maybe I'll appear in your dreams~

::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 24.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' If fate is the ultimate knowledge, then your future will be the ultimate fate.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 paimon 03e 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon's sure glad we got to meet you, Nahida.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 25.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' The pleasure is all mine... I can't thank you enough.
::{{A|vo xmaq305 15 nahida 04e 26.ogg}} '''Nahida:''' All right, that's enough talk for today. If you ever miss me, just close your eyes &mdash; and maybe I'll appear in your dreams~
{{Dialogue End}}
